summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 HYUNDAI GENESIS. WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 5 MPH AND APPROACHING AN INTERSECTION, THE VEHICLE STALLED. THERE WERE NO WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE CONTACT SWITCHED TO PARK AND RESTARTED THE VEHICLE. THE CONTACT ALSO STATED THAT THE FAILURE OCCURRED TWICE ON JULY 10, 2017. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO ORLANDO HYUNDAI IN ORLANDO, FLORIDA FOR DIAGNOSTIC TESTING AND THE THROTTLE BODY WAS CLEANED. THE DEALER WAS NOT ABLE TO DUPLICATE THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 42,000.
